entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
